verbs.description: And [ARG1: this] [V: is] [ARG2: the end of civility and common goodness] . It has become a novelty in the age of Trump . This kind of hateful rhetoric is why so many of us have planted our feet on principle and turned our backs on partisanship , unwilling to trade our character , if partisanship means we stand shoulder - to - shoulder with …
